abstract: Maurice Lévy, chief of Publicis Groupe, said the company’s expertise in digital marketing, had helped it to win business from technology companies like Microsoft.
snippet: Maurice Lévy, chief of Publicis Groupe, said the company’s expertise in digital marketing, had helped it to win business from technology companies like Microsoft.
lead_paragraph: WHEN Microsoft last month awarded a big portion of its North American advertising account to the Publicis Groupe, the marketing company based in Paris, the news felt like vindication for its chief executive, Maurice Lévy.

headline.main: At Publicis, a Big Bet on Digital Seems to Be Paying Off
headline.print_headline: At Publicis, a Big Bet on Digital Seems to Be Paying Off
